function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 in hotel environments due to decreased occupancy and travel demand","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission, potential outbreak, and reduced revenue","Mitigation":"Implement stringent cleaning and disinfection protocols, enforce social distancing measures, and provide staff and guests with personal protective equipment","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC systems with air filtration, contactless check-in/out systems, and UV-C disinfection technology","People":"Hotel staff, guests, and local communities","Owner":"Hotel management and industry associations"},{"Description":"Economic impact on the hotel and tourism industry due to decreased occupancy and travel demand","Impact":"Job losses, decreased revenue, and financial instability for businesses","Mitigation":"Financial support, government aid, and development of alternative revenue streams such as staycation promotions and virtual experiences","Technologies":"Online booking platforms, virtual tour technology, and digital marketing strategies","People":"Hotel employees, travel and tourism workers, and small business owners","Owner":"Government, industry associations, and hotel management"},{"Description":"Risk of job loss in the global travel and tourism sector","Impact":"Unemployment, financial stress, and reduced consumer spending","Mitigation":"Retraining programs, alternative employment opportunities, and economic stimulus packages","Technologies":"Online education platforms, virtual job fairs, and remote work technology","People":"Travel and tourism workers, small business owners, and communities reliant on tourism","Owner":"Government, industry associations, and educational institutions"}]}
